title: Bonus - The Water Crisis in Jackson, Mississippi
itunes:title: Bonus - The Water Crisis in Jackson, Mississippi
description: Historic rainfall in Jackson, Mississippi overwhelmed the already fragile water system leaving thousands of residents without water weeks later. Dr. Richard Mizelle, an environmental historian at the University of Houston, talks with Dr. Josh Sharfstein about the crisis that was decades in the making, who is most at risk without clean water, and how environmental racism poses deadly threats to communities across the US. Also -  We want to hear from you!
